## DIDComm.sendMessageDIDCommAlpha1() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendMessageDIDCommAlpha1(args: ISendMessageDIDCommAlpha1Args, context: IAgentContext<IDIDManager & IKeyManager & IResolver & IMessageHandler>): Promise<IMessage>;
```
